notes_display: Caleb Davis.  Davis in red ink. Plate A.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Three Pence. This Bill shall pass
issue_obverse_legend_s: current for Three Pence, according to an Act of General Assembly of the Common-Wealth of Pennsylvania, passed the Twentieth Day of March, in the Year One Thousand Seven Hundred and Seventy-seven. Dated the Tenth Day of April, A. D. 1777. Three Pence.
issue_reverse_legend_s: To Counterfeit is DEATH. | THREE PENCE. | PHILADELPHIA: Printed by JOHN DUNLAP. 1777. | THREE PENCE.
